verses.text: \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* dasheth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* pieces \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* face: \w keep|strong="H2287"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* munition, \w watch|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H5674"\w*, \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* loins strong, fortify \w thy|strong="H8085"\w* power mightily.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w bringeth|strong="H5927"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* excellency \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Jacob, \w as|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* excellency \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* emptiers \w have|strong="H5921"\w* emptied \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* marred \w their|strong="H6440"\w* vine branches.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* shield \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* mighty \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* red, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* valiant \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* scarlet: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* chariots flash \w with|strong="H3068"\w* steel \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* preparation, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* spears \w are|strong="H3478"\w* shaken terribly.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* rage \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* streets, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* justle \w one|strong="H1368"\w* \w against|strong="H2428"\w* \w another|strong="H1368"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* broad ways: \w the|strong="H3117"\w* appearance \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H4043"\w* \w torches|strong="H6393"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* run \w like|strong="H4043"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* lightnings.

\w He|strong="H2351"\w* remembereth \w his|strong="H1984"\w* worthies: \w they|strong="H7323"\w* stumble \w in|strong="H7393"\w* \w their|strong="H1984"\w* march; \w they|strong="H7323"\w* \w make|strong="H7323"\w* haste \w to|strong="H7323"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* wall thereof, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* mantelet \w is|strong="H4758"\w* prepared.
\w The|strong="H2142"\w* gates \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* rivers \w are|strong="H3782"\w* opened, \w and|strong="H4116"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* palace is dissolved.

\w And|strong="H8179"\w* Huzzab \w is|strong="H5104"\w* uncovered, she \w is|strong="H5104"\w* carried \w away|strong="H4127"\w*, \w and|strong="H8179"\w* \w her|strong="H6605"\w* handmaids mourn \w as|strong="H8179"\w* \w with|strong="H4127"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H8179"\w* doves, tabering upon their breasts.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nineveh|strong="H5324"\w* hath \w been|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* old \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pool \w of|strong="H6963"\w* water: \w yet|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* flee \w away|strong="H1540"\w*; \w Stand|strong="H5324"\w*, \w stand|strong="H5324"\w*, \add they cry\add*; \w but|strong="H5921"\w* none looketh \w back|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H5975"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* spoil \w of|strong="H3117"\w* silver, \w take|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* spoil \w of|strong="H3117"\w* gold: \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* none end \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* store, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* pleasant furniture.

\w She|strong="H3627"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* empty, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* void, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* waste: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heart melteth, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* knees smite together, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* anguish \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* loins, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* faces \w of|strong="H3627"\w* them \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3627"\w* waxed pale.

Where \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* den \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lions, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* feeding \w place|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* young lions, where \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lion \add and \add*\w the|strong="H3605"\w* lioness walked, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lionâ€™s whelp, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* afraid?

\w The|strong="H8033"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* \w did|strong="H1980"\w* tear \w in|strong="H1980"\w* pieces enough \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w whelps|strong="H1482"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* strangled \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* \w lionesses|strong="H3833"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* filled \w his|strong="H1980"\w* caves \w with|strong="H1980"\w* prey, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* dens \w with|strong="H1980"\w* ravin.

Behold, \w I|strong="H1767"\w* am against thee, saith \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* hosts, \w and|strong="H3833"\w* \w I|strong="H1767"\w* will burn \w her|strong="H4390"\w* chariots \w in|strong="H2963"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* smoke, \w and|strong="H3833"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* sword shall devour \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w young|strong="H3833"\w* \w lions|strong="H3833"\w*: \w and|strong="H3833"\w* \w I|strong="H1767"\w* will cut off \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w* \w from|strong="H1767"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3833"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4390"\w* shall no more be heard.
